<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="381" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="96" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>Article 1.</font></b></p> </td>
        <td width="285" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>Establishment, Objectives, and Duration</font></b></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><b><font size=2>1.1.</font></b><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><b><font size=2>Establishment of the Plan</font></b><font size=2>.  The Southern Company (hereinafter referred to as the &#147;Company&#148;), hereby establishes this &#147;Southern Company 2006 Omnibus Incentive Compensation Plan&#148; (hereinafter referred to as the &#147;Plan&#148;), as set forth in&nbsp;this document. The Plan&nbsp;permits the grant of Nonqualified Stock Options, Incentive Stock Options, Stock Appreciation Rights, Restricted Stock, Restricted Stock Units, Performance Shares, Performance Units, and Cash-Based Awards.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>Subject to approval by the Company&#146;s stockholders, the Plan shall become effective as of January 1, 2006 (the &#147;Effective Date&#148;) and shall remain in effect as provided in Section&nbsp;1.3 hereof. </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><b><font size=2>1.2.</font></b><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><b><font size=2>Objectives of the Plan</font></b><font size=2>. The objectives of the Plan are to optimize the profitability and growth of the Company through annual and long-term incentives that are consistent with the Company&#146;s goals and that link the personal interests of Participants to those of the Company&#146;s stockholders; to provide Participants with an incentive for excellence in individual performance; and to promote teamwork among Participants.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.38in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>The Plan is further intended to provide flexibility to the&nbsp;Company in its ability to motivate, attract, and retain the services of Employees and Directors who make significant contributions to the Company&#146;s success and to allow those individuals to share in the success of the Company.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><b><font size=2>1.3.</font></b><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><b><font size=2>Duration of the Plan</font></b><font size=2>. The Plan shall commence on the Effective Date and shall remain in effect, subject to the right of the Board of Directors to amend or terminate the Plan at any time pursuant to Article&nbsp;14 hereof, until all Shares subject to it shall have been purchased or acquired according to the Plan&#146;s provisions. However, in no event may an Award be granted under the Plan on or after the tenth anniversary of the Effective Date.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="188" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="96" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>Article 2.</font></b></p> </td>
        <td width="92" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>Definitions</font></b></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.38in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>Whenever used in the Plan, the following terms shall have the meanings set forth below, and when the meaning is intended, the initial letter of the word shall be capitalized:</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table  border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='margin-left:.5in;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>2.1.</font></b></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Award&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means, individually or collectively, a&nbsp;grant under this Plan of Nonqualified Stock Options, Incentive Stock Options, Stock Appreciation Rights, Restricted Stock, Restricted Stock Units, Performance Shares, Performance Units, or Cash-Based Awards. </font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table  border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='margin-left:.5in;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>2.2.</font></b></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Award Agreement&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means an agreement entered into by the Company and each Participant setting forth the terms and provisions applicable to Awards granted under this Plan, which agreement may be delivered and executed in electronic form.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="28" style='margin-left:231.0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="28" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>1</font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

        <td width="525" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Board&#148;</font></b><font size=2> or </font><b><font size=2>&#147;Board of Directors&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means the Board of Directors of the Company.</font><b></b></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Cash-Based Award&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means an Award granted to a Participant, as described in Article&nbsp;9 herein.  </font></p> </td> </tr></table>

        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Change in Control Benefit Plan Determination Policy&#148;</font></b><font size=2> shall mean the change in control benefit plan determination policy, as approved by the Board of Directors of Southern Company Services, Inc., as it may be amended from time to time in accordance with the provisions therein.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Committee&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means any committee appointed by the Board to administer Awards to Employees, as specified in Article&nbsp;3 herein.  The Committee shall at all times maintain compliance with Code Section 162(m), or any successor statute thereto, as to the composition of the Committee.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Company&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means The Southern Company, a Delaware corporation, and any successor thereto as provided in Article&nbsp;17 herein. </font></p> </td> </tr></table>

        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Covered Employee&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means a Participant who, as of the date of vesting and/or payout of an Award, as applicable, is one of the group of &#147;covered employees,&#148; as defined in the regulations promulgated under Code Section 162(m), or any successor statute.  </font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table  border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='margin-left:.5in;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>2.11.</font></b></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Director&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means any individual who is a member of the Board of Directors of the Company or any Subsidiary; provided, however, that any Director who is employed by the Company or any Subsidiary shall be considered an Employee under the Plan. </font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table  border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='margin-left:.5in;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>2.12.</font></b></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Disability&#148;</font></b><font size=2> shall have the meaning ascribed to such term in the Participant&#146;s governing long-term disability plan, or if no such plan exists, at the discretion of the Committee.   </font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="324" style='margin-left:.5in;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top >

        <td width="276" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Effective Date&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means January 1, 2006.</font><b></b></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table  border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='margin-left:.5in;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>2.14.</font></b></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Employee&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means any employee of the Company or its Subsidiaries.  Directors who are employed by the Company or its Subsidiaries shall be considered Employees under this Plan. </font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table  border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='margin-left:.5in;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>2.15.</font></b></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Exchange Act&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended from time to time, or any successor act thereto.  </font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table  border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='margin-left:.5in;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>2.16.</font></b></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Fair Market Value&#148;</font></b><font size=2> shall mean the average of the high and low prices at which a share of Common Stock shall have been traded on the respective measurement date, </font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

    <tr >
        <td width="28" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2</font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>such as the date of grant or the exercise of an Award, or on the next preceding trading day if such date was not a trading date, as reported by the principal securities exchange on which the Shares are traded or, if there is no such sale on the relevant date, then on the last previous day on which a sale was reported. If the Shares are not listed for trading on a national securities exchange, the fair market value of the Shares shall be determined by the Committee in good faith and in accordance with a reasonable valuation method as determined under Code Section 409A and the rules and regulations promulgated thereunder. </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table  border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='margin-left:.5in;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>2.17.</font></b></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Freestanding SAR&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means an SAR that is granted independently of any Options, as described in Article 7 herein. </font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table  border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='margin-left:.5in;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>2.18.</font></b></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Incentive Stock Option&#148;</font></b><font size=2> or </font><b><font size=2>&#147;ISO&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means an option to purchase Shares granted under Article 6 herein and which is designated as an Incentive&nbsp;Stock Option and which is intended to meet the requirements of&nbsp;Code Section 422.  </font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table  border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='margin-left:.5in;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>2.19.</font></b></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Insider&#148;</font></b><font size=2> shall mean an individual who is, on the relevant date, an officer, director or more than ten&nbsp;percent (10%) beneficial owner of any class of the Company&#146;s equity securities that is registered pursuant to Section&nbsp;12 of the Exchange Act, all as defined under Section&nbsp;16 of the Exchange Act. </font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table  border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='margin-left:.5in;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>2.20.</font></b></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Nonqualified Stock Option&#148;</font></b><font size=2> or </font><b><font size=2>&#147;NQSO&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means an&nbsp;option to purchase Shares granted under Article&nbsp;6 herein and which is not intended to meet the requirements of Code Section 422. </font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table  border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='margin-left:.5in;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>2.21.</font></b></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Option&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means an Incentive Stock Option or a Nonqualified Stock&nbsp;Option, as described in Article 6 herein. </font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table  border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='margin-left:.5in;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>2.22.</font></b></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Option Price&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means the price at which a Share may be purchased by a Participant pursuant to an Option. </font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table  border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='margin-left:.5in;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>2.23.</font></b></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Participant&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means an Employee or Director who has been selected to receive an Award or with respect to whom an Award is outstanding under the Plan.  </font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table  border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='margin-left:.5in;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>2.24.</font></b></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><b><font size=2>Performance-Based Exception&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means the performance-based exception from the tax deductibility limitations of Code Section 162(m). </font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table  border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='margin-left:.5in;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>2.25.</font></b></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Performance Period&#148; </font></b><font size=2>means with respect to Performance Units, Performance Shares and, if applicable, Cash-Based Awards, the time period during which any performance goals will be measured.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table  border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='margin-left:.5in;border-collapse:collapse'>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Performance Share&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means an Award granted to a Participant, as described in Article&nbsp;9 herein.  </font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<table  border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='margin-left:.5in;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>2.28.</font></b></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Period of Restriction&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means the period during which the transfer of Shares of Restricted Stock is limited in some way (based on the passage of time, the achievement of performance goals, or upon the occurrence of other events as determined by the Committee, at its discretion), and the Shares are subject to a substantial risk of forfeiture, as provided in Article 8 herein. </font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

        <td  valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Restricted Stock&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means an Award granted to a Participant, as described in Article 8 herein.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>

    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top >

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>&#147;Shares&#148;</font></b><font size=2> means the shares of Common Stock.  </font><b></b></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top >
