<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>5.14&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><u><font size=2>Financial Statements</font></u><font size=2>.  Provided as </font><u><font size=2>Section 5.14</font></u><font size=2> of the </font><u><font size=2>Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule</font></u><font size=2> are annual unaudited balance sheets and statements of income as of and for the periods ended December 31, 2003, December 31, 2004 and December 31, 2005 (with the period ended December 31, 2005 being, the &#147;</font><u><font size=2>Most Recent Fiscal Year End</font></u><font size=2>&#148;) for the Project Company (with respect to the Most Recent Fiscal Year End, the &#147;</font><u><font size=2>Financial Statements</font></u><font size=2>&#148;).  Except with respect to the operations, assets and liabilities reflected in the agreements to be assigned and assumed pursuant to </font><u><font size=2>Sections 3.2(g)</font></u><font size=2>
and </font><u><font size=2>3.2(i)</font></u><font size=2>, the Financial Statements (including the notes thereto) have been prepared in accordance with GAAP applied on a consistent basis throughout the periods covered thereby, present fairly the financial condition of the Project Company as of such dates and the results of operations (and changes in financial position, if any) of the Project Company for such periods, are correct and complete, and are consistent with the books and records of the Project Company.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2><a name="toc36"></a>5.15&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><u><font size=2>Events Subsequent to Most Recent Fiscal Year End</font></u><font size=2>.  Except with respect to the operations, assets and liabilities reflected in the agreements to be assigned and assumed pursuant to </font><u><font size=2>Sections 3.2(g)</font></u><font size=2>, and </font><u><font size=2>3.2(i)</font></u><font size=2>, since the Most Recent Fiscal Year End, no event, condition or circumstance has arisen that has caused or is reasonably expected to cause a Project Company Material Adverse Effect. </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2><a name="toc37"></a>5.16&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><u><font size=2>Minute Books</font></u><font size=2>.  The minute books of the Project Company are complete and correct in all material respects and have been maintained in accordance with sound business practices.  The minute books of the Project Company contain accurate and complete records of all meetings of, and corporate action taken by, the Seller in its capacity as sole owner of the Membership Interest in the Project Company, and no meeting of the Seller acting in such capacity has been held for which minutes have not been prepared and are not contained in such minute books.  Except as set forth in </font><u><font size=2>Section 5.16</font></u><font size=2> of the </font><u><font size=2>Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule</font></u><font size=2>, the Seller has heretofore delivered to the Purchaser true and complete copies of all
minute books of the Project Company.  </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2><a name="toc38"></a>5.17&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><u><font size=2>Emissions Allowances</font></u><font size=2>.  The Project Company owns all right, title and interest in and to all Emissions Allowances as they relate to the Facility, which such Emissions Allowances are set forth in </font><u><font size=2>Section 5.17</font></u><font size=2> to the </font><u><font size=2>Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule</font></u><font size=2>.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2><a name="toc39"></a>5.18&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><u><font size=2>Undisclosed Liabilities</font></u><font size=2>.  Except (a) as set forth in </font><u><font size=2>Section 5.18</font></u><font size=2> of the </font><u><font size=2>Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule</font></u><font size=2> and the other exhibits and schedules hereto, (b) as disclosed in the Financial Statements or in any notes thereto, (c) for liabilities and obligations incurred in the Ordinary Course of Business and (d) with respect to the operations, assets and liabilities reflected in the agreements to be assigned and assumed pursuant to </font><u><font size=2>Sections 3.2(g)</font></u><font size=2> and </font><u><font size=2>3.2(i)</font></u><font size=2>, to the Knowledge of the Seller, the Project Company does not have any other material Liabilities.  Other than as set forth in the Financial Statements or as to
which the Project Company in good faith has disputed or determined to dispute or not pay, no unpaid invoices, bills representing amounts alleged to be owed by the Project Company or other alleged obligations of the Project Company exist which are material to the business or operations of the Project Company.</font></p>


<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="109" style='margin-left:63.0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2><a name="toc40"></a>5.19</font></p> </td>
        <td width="61" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Taxes</font></u><font size=2>.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="36" style='margin-left:210.0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="36" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>28</font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style='page-break-before:always'></p>
<pAGE>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as set forth in </font><u><font size=2>Section 5.19(a)</font></u><font size=2> of the </font><u><font size=2>Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule</font></u><font size=2>, the Seller, with respect to the Project Company, and the Project Company have filed or caused to be filed on a timely basis all Tax Returns with respect to Taxes that are or were required to be filed pursuant to Applicable Laws.  All such Tax Returns filed by the Seller, with respect to the Project Company, and the Project Company are true, correct and complete in all material respects.  The Seller, with respect to the Project Company, and the Project Company have paid, or made provision for the payment of, all Taxes that have or may have become due for all periods covered by such Tax Returns, or pursuant to any assessment received by the Seller, with respect to the Project Company, or
the Project Company, except such Taxes, if any, as are not yet delinquent or are listed in </font><u><font size=2>Section 5.19(a)</font></u><font size=2> of the </font><u><font size=2>Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule</font></u><font size=2> and are being contested in good faith.  Except as set forth in </font><u><font size=2>Section 5.19(a)</font></u><font size=2> of the </font><u><font size=2>Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule</font></u><font size=2>, no claim has ever been made or, to the Knowledge of the Seller, proposed or threatened by any Taxing Authority in a jurisdiction where the Seller, with respect to the Project Company, or the Project Company does not file Tax Returns that it is or may be subject to taxation by that jurisdiction.  There are no Encumbrances for Taxes on any Assets, except to the extent of statutory Encumbrances for Taxes accruing but not yet due and payable or which are being contested in good faith by appropriate proceedings.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;There is no dispute or claim concerning any Taxes of the Seller, with respect to the Project Company, or the Project Company claimed or raised by any Governmental Authority in writing or, to the Knowledge of the Seller, proposed or threatened.  Except as described in </font><u><font size=2>Section 5.19(b)</font></u><font size=2> of the </font><u><font size=2>Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule</font></u><font size=2> to this Agreement, the Seller, with respect to the Project Company, and the Project Company have not given or been requested to give waivers or extensions of any statute of limitations relating to the payment of Taxes of the Seller, with respect to the Project Company, or the Project Company for any open taxable years or periods.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as set forth in </font><u><font size=2>Section 5.19(c)</font></u><font size=2> of the </font><u><font size=2>Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule</font></u><font size=2>, all Taxes that the Seller, with respect to the Project Company, or the Project Company is or was required by Applicable Law to withhold, deduct or collect have been duly withheld, deducted and collected and, to the extent required, have been paid to the proper Governmental Authority or other Person, and all Tax Returns, including but not limited to Forms W-2 and 1099 (and any similar forms, reports or statements required under state, local or foreign law), required with respect thereto have been properly completed and timely filed. </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Project Company is classified as a &#147;disregarded entity&#148; within the meaning of Treasury Regulation Section 301.7701-2(a), and has not made an election to be treated as an association within the meaning of Treasury Regulation Section 301.7701-3. </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;None of Progress Energy or</font><b><font size=2> </font></b><font size=2>the</font><b><font size=2> </font></b><font size=2>Seller, with respect to the Project Company, or the Project Company has made any payments, is obligated to make any payments, or is a party to any agreement that under certain circumstances could obligate the Project Company to make any payments that are not deductible under Code Section 280G subsequent to the Closing Date. </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as set forth in </font><u><font size=2>Section 5.19(f)</font></u><font size=2> of the </font><u><font size=2>Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule</font></u><font size=2>, the Assets have not been classified by any Taxing Authority under the designation authorized by Law to obtain a special low Property Tax rate or to receive a reduction, abatement or deferment of Property Taxes.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2><a name="toc41"></a>5.20&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><u><font size=2>Intellectual Property</font></u><font size=2>.  Except as set forth in </font><u><font size=2>Section 5.20</font></u><font size=2> of the </font><u><font size=2>Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule</font></u><font size=2>, the Project Company does not own, or directly license from a third party, any Intellectual Property.  The Project Company either owns free and clear of all Encumbrances, or possesses sufficient rights to use, all Intellectual Property listed in </font><u><font size=2>Section 5.20</font></u><font size=2> of the </font><u><font size=2>Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule</font></u><font size=2> (the &#147;</font><u><font size=2>Intellectual Property Assets</font></u><font size=2>&#148;).</font><b><font size=2> </font></b></p>


<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="133" style='margin-left:63.0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2><a name="toc42"></a>5.21</font></p> </td>
        <td width="85" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Insurance</font></u><font size=2>.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><u><font size=2>Section 5.21</font></u><font size=2> of the </font><u><font size=2>Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule</font></u><font size=2> to this Agreement sets forth a list of (1) all insurance policies (A) to which the Seller, with respect to the Project Company, or the Project Company is a party, named insured or otherwise the beneficiary and (B) which are currently in force or under which the Seller, with respect to the Project Company, or the Project Company could potentially still submit claims for losses with respect to the Project, and (2) all pending applications therefor as are applicable to cover the Assets.  The Seller has delivered to the Purchaser:</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1.5in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;accurate and complete copies of all policies of insurance (and material correspondence relating to coverage thereunder) listed in </font><u><font size=2>Section 5.21</font></u><font size=2> of the </font><u><font size=2>Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule</font></u><font size=2> to this Agreement; and</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1.5in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;accurate and complete copies of all pending applications by the Project Company for policies of insurance as listed in </font><u><font size=2>Section 5.21</font></u><font size=2> of the </font><u><font size=2>Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule</font></u><font size=2>.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All policies of insurance described in </font><u><font size=2>Section 5.21</font></u><font size=2> of the </font><u><font size=2>Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule</font></u><font size=2> to this Agreement: (A) are valid and enforceable; (B) are sufficient for compliance with all Applicable Laws and Material Agreements; and (C) do not provide for any retrospective premium adjustment or other experienced-based liability on the part of the Project Company.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;As regards the policies described in </font><u><font size=2>Section 5.21</font></u><font size=2> of the </font><u><font size=2>Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule</font></u><font size=2> to this Agreement, the Project Company has not received (i) any refusal of coverage or any notice that a defense will be afforded with reservation of rights or (ii) any notice of cancellation or any other indication that any such policy of insurance is no longer in full force or effect or that the issuer of any such policy of insurance is not willing or able to perform its obligations thereunder.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;As regards the policies described in </font><u><font size=2>Section 5.21</font></u><font size=2> of the </font><u><font size=2>Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule</font></u><font size=2> to this Agreement, the Project Company has paid all premiums due, and has otherwise performed all of its material obligations under each such policy of insurance.  </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2><a name="toc43"></a>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>5.22&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><u><font size=2>Contracts</font></u><font size=2>.  </font><u><font size=2>Section 5.22</font></u><font size=2> of the </font><u><font size=2>Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule</font></u><font size=2> lists the following types of contracts and other agreements, as they may have been amended, (&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Material Agreements</font></u><font size=2>&#148;) to which the Project Company is a party:</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any agreement that involves delivery of power, including the Duke Power Contracts and the NCMPA Contracts, performance of services or procurement or delivery of equipment, materials or supplies, or the conveyance of rights (e.g., transmission rights), to the Project Company of an amount or value in excess of one hundred thousand U.S. dollars ($100,000);</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any agreement affecting the ownership of, leasing of, title to, use of or any leasehold or other interest in any real or personal property that, in the case of personal property, is of an amount or value in excess of one hundred thousand U.S. dollars ($100,000);</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any agreement (however named) involving a sharing of profits, losses, costs or liabilities by the Project Company with any other Person;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any agreement containing covenants that in any material way purport to restrict the Project Company&#146;s business activity or limit the freedom of the Project Company to engage in business or to compete with any Person;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any power of attorney of the Project Company that is currently effective and outstanding;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any material written warranty, guaranty or other similar undertaking with respect to contractual performance, which was extended (i) by or on behalf of the Project Company or (ii) to the Project Company; </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>(g)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;each Affiliated Contract or other intercompany arrangement between the Project Company and its Affiliates, exclusive of any agreement set forth on </font><u><font size=2>Section 3.2(h)</font></u><font size=2> of the </font><u><font size=2>Seller&#146;s Disclosure Schedule</font></u><font size=2>; and </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:1in;text-align:left;'><font size=2>(h)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any amendment, supplement and modification (whether oral or written) in respect of any of the foregoing.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>With respect to each Material Agreement of the Project Company:  (A) a true and complete copy of such Material Agreement was made available to the Purchaser in connection with its due diligence; (B) such Material Agreement will in all material respects continue to be legal, valid, binding and enforceable against the Project Company, without amendment, except as permitted in </font><u><font size=2>Section 7.2(b)</font></u><font size=2>, and, to the Seller&#146;s Knowledge, enforceable against the other party thereto, following the consummation of the transactions contemplated hereby except for Affiliated Contracts; (C)&nbsp;the Project Company is not in material breach or default and has not given or received any notice regarding any alleged material violation or breach of, or material default under, any Material Agreement being transferred to the Purchaser, and, to the Seller&#146;s Knowledge, no other party
is in material breach or default, and no event or circumstance has occurred which with provision of notice or expiration of any applicable cure period would </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="36" style='margin-left:210.0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="36" valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>31</font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>
